channel.title: 经济学人
channel.description: 这是一个追踪经济学人news的种子

item.title: 中国的沙滩文化是社会的缩影 👇
item.description: China’s beach culture is a microcosm of society econ.st/3SQjZBV 👇

item.title: 漫威的衰落令人惊讶：长期以来，这个品牌似乎所向披靡。迪斯尼内部人士认为，漫威的衰落有几个原因 👇
item.description: The decline of Marvel is surprising: for a long time, the brand seemed invincible. Disney insiders suggest several causes for the slump econ.st/3SRLKv3 👇

item.title: 以色列蔑视美国史无前例的和平计划。该地区战火纷飞，比比-内塔尼亚胡却不屈不挠👇。
item.description: Israel has scorned America’s unprecedented peace plan. As the region burns, Bibi Netanyahu is defiant econ.st/3SuEGmz 👇

item.title: 经过几十年的现代化建设，中国的武装力量非常强大，甚至令人生畏。然而，再仔细观察，问题便跃然纸上 👇。
item.description: After decades of modernisation, China’s armed forces are formidable—terrifying, even. Yet look more closely and the problems leap out econ.st/49pSOo1 👇

item.title: 一种 "涡轮增压超级猪 "正在加拿大大草原上肆虐。当它们南迁时会发生什么？ 👇
item.description: A breed of “turbocharged superpigs” is raising hell on the Canadian prairies. What could happen when they move south? econ.st/3uoZpQG 👇

item.title:
在巴基斯坦即将举行议会选举之际，这个国家很少出现如此混乱的局面。它是如何走到这一步的？以下六本书可以帮你找到答案：
图片：Rex ShutterstockRex Shutterstock
item.description:
As Pakistan heads for a parliamentary election, the country has rarely been in such a mess. How did it get there? Here are six books to help you find out: econ.st/3uztwox

Image: Rex Shutterstock

item.title: 在撒哈拉以南非洲地区，融资和建房方面的困难导致了严重的住房危机。然而，非洲大陆对住房的需求也是一个巨大的机遇👇。
item.description: The struggle to finance and build homes is contributing to a profound housing crisis in sub-Saharan Africa. Yet the continent’s need for housing is also a tremendous opportunity econ.st/4bmiAv4 👇

item.title: 美国众议院共和党人正在帮助弗拉基米尔-普京。他们在乌克兰问题上的玩世不恭削弱了美国，使世界变得不那么安全👇。
item.description: House Republicans in America are helping Vladimir Putin. Their cynicism over Ukraine weakens America and makes the world less safe econ.st/3OzBCo2 👇

item.title: 中国的经济前景比近代历史上任何时期都要黯淡。房地产市场的严峻形势是主要原因👇。
item.description: China’s economic prospects are gloomier than at any point in recent history. The dire state of the property market is the chief cause econ.st/3w6GWc5 👇

item.title: 社交媒体正在经历一场深刻却鲜为人知的变革。令人震惊的是，社交媒体不再具有社交属性。潮流正在转向 👇
item.description: Social media are undergoing a profound but little-noticed transformation. Strikingly, they are no longer very social. The tide is turning econ.st/483LrBr 👇

item.title: 韩国的编剧和导演在玩 "乌贼游戏"。韩国影视业蓬勃发展的幕后推手并未从中获利👇。
item.description: South Korea’s writers and directors play Squid Game. The people behind the country’s TV and film boom are not profiting from it econ.st/3UwSqzG 👇

item.title:
泰勒-斯威夫特（Taylor Swift）出现在阴谋论者的咆哮声中，成为他们噩梦中的女主角，这似乎有些奇怪。
但在极端两极化的美国，政治纷争会蔓延到不可能的地方👇。
item.description:
It may seem odd for Taylor Swift to feature in the rants of conspiracists—to be the actress starring in their bad dreams, as she might put it.

But in an ultra-polarised America, political strife spreads into unlikely places econ.st/3ueSJVr 👇

item.title: 美国购物者的钱包越来越紧。中国消费者越来越谨慎。制造业的繁荣正在放缓。进一步了解美国企业面临的三大威胁： 👇
item.description: American shoppers are tightening their purse-strings. Chinese consumers are growing more cautious. And the manufacturing boom is slowing down. Learn more about the three threats to American business: econ.st/3SJBF2X 👇

item.title: 这十张图表比较了乔-拜登和唐纳德-特朗普的记录。谁更胜一筹？ 👇
item.description: These ten charts compare Joe Biden’s record with Donald Trump’s. Who comes out better? econ.st/4bwIJY8 👇

item.title: 参议院的边境法案对国会政治有何启示？美国国会的一院正在努力治理国家。另一院只想竞选 👇
item.description: What does the Senate’s border bill reveal about congressional politics? One chamber of America’s Congress is trying to govern. The other just wants to campaign econ.st/494LD4W 👇

item.title: 从对巨型项目的探讨，到关于金融领域最重要、最被忽视的问题之一的引人入胜的书籍，我们精选了九本书，加入您的阅读清单👇。
item.description: From an exploration of megaprojects to a compelling book on one of the most important and neglected questions in finance, we’ve picked out nine titles to add to your reading list econ.st/495HBt2 👇

item.title: 中层管理者常常被认为是懒惰的。事实上，他们有一个共同的问题👇。
item.description: Middle managers are often presumed to be lazy. In fact, they are suffering from a common problem econ.st/3SLgaPg 👇

item.title: 从经济、商业和政治到科学、艺术和小说，我们的作家和评论家推荐了一些好书👇。
item.description: From economics, business and politics to science, art and fiction, our writers and critics recommend some good books econ.st/3OuXKQf 👇

item.title: 美国国务卿安东尼-布林肯认为，中东正处于一个岔路口。一条路是拯救。另一条路则通向诅咒，加沙的战火仍在继续，与伊朗盟友的战争也在升级：
item.description: Anthony Blinken, America’s secretary of state, thinks the Middle East is at a fork. One way lies salvation. The other leads to damnation, with the fighting continuing in Gaza and an escalating war with Iran’s allies: econ.st/496tRhE

item.title: 自 2011 年埃及军队发动革命推翻胡斯尼-穆巴拉克以来，人们对埃及军队的支持逐渐减弱。当时和现在一样，不断上涨的面包价格激起了人们的愤怒。但今天的经济危机要严重得多 👇。
item.description: Support for Egypt’s army has faded since 2011, when it allowed a revolution to topple Hosni Mubarak. Then, as now, rising bread prices fuelled anger. But the economic crisis is far worse today econ.st/494XaRS 👇

item.title: 阿拉伯国家正在向以色列提供令人瞩目的 "安全保证"。但比比-内塔尼亚胡却不屑一顾👇。
item.description: Arab states are offering remarkable “security assurances” to Israel. But Bibi Netanyahu is defiant econ.st/3uxm8tN 👇

item.title: 唐纳德-特朗普喜欢记仇，对 TikTok 的记仇无疑是尖锐的。但在决定是否继续讨伐该平台之前，他还需要进行一番政治算计。阅读更多 👇
item.description: Donald Trump savours his grudges and the one against TikTok is no doubt acute. But before deciding whether to renew his crusade against the platform, he has a political calculation to make. Read more econ.st/3HKwDx1 👇

item.title: 合成阿片类药物、资金不足和惩罚性态度--这就是英国在禁毒战争中的失败👇。
item.description: Synthetic opioids, inadequate funding and a punitive attitude—this is how Britain lost its war on drugs econ.st/3OAbSbk 👇

item.title: 台湾和中国之间确实有可能发生战争。中国人对此怎么看？@DSORennie 和 @aliceysu 将在我们的 "鼓楼 "播客👇中揭晓答案。
item.description: War between Taiwan and China is a real possibility. What do Chinese people think about that? @DSORennie and @aliceysu find out, on our “Drum Tower” podcast econ.st/3HRqWNW 👇

item.title:
♦️ 乔-拜登敦促国会通过一项边境安全法案。
♦️ 在内华达州的共和党初选中，"这些候选人都不是 "的选项击败了尼基-黑利。
♦️ 麦克-约翰逊（Mike Johnson）在众议院遭遇两场大败。
阅读美国政坛最新动态：
item.description:
♦️ Joe Biden urged Congress to pass a border-security bill.

♦️ The “none of these candidates” option beat Nikki Haley in Nevada’s Republican primary.

♦️ Mike Johnson suffered two big losses in the House.

Read the latest in American politics: econ.st/489IBLs

item.title: 不清楚何时平凡的 "现在"（由记者处理）变成了不朽的 "过去"（由历史学家处理）。是一个月之后？一年之后？十年？ 👇
item.description: It is not clear when the mundane “present” (to be dealt with by journalists) becomes the monumental “past” (to be dealt with by historians). Is it after a month? A year? A decade? econ.st/3HSbwZL 👇

item.title: 美国比任何其他大国都更依赖汽车，平均每个家庭拥有两辆汽车。这反过来又与许多弊端联系在一起，但也有一些令人惊讶的好处 👇
item.description: America is far more car-reliant than any other big country, averaging roughly two vehicles per household. This, in turn, is linked to many ills—but there are also some surprising benefits econ.st/49JpSYr 👇

item.title: 尽管就业市场蓬勃发展，美国公司的燃料却越来越少。人工智能能否帮助提高底线？ 👇
item.description: Even as the jobs market booms, America Inc is running low on fuel. Could AI help boost the bottom line? econ.st/3OvJQ0e 👇

item.title: 市场给了年轻人一手烂牌。他们可以打得更好。他们应该这样投资 👇
item.description: Markets have dealt young people a bad hand. They could be playing it better. This is how they should invest econ.st/3HQXwPL 👇

item.title: 姜黄正在杀人。发展中国家--尤其是印度--应该学习孟加拉国公开、务实的尝试，防止这种情况发生👇。
item.description: Turmeric is killing people. Developing countries—especially India—should learn from Bangladesh’s open, pragmatic attempts to prevent this from happening econ.st/3SOokGD 👇
